scripts.deploy:optimism:kovan: yarn build:optimism-kovan && graph deploy --debug --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ mean-finance/dca-v2-optimism-kovan-canary
scripts.deploy:optimism:kovan:stable: yarn build:optimism-kovan && graph deploy --debug --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ mean-finance/dca-v2-optimism-kovan
scripts.deploy:optimism:mainnet: yarn build:optimism && graph deploy --debug --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ mean-finance/dca-v2-optimism-canary
scripts.deploy:optimism:mainnet:stable: yarn build:optimism && graph deploy --debug --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ mean-finance/dca-v2-optimism
scripts.prepare:optimism: mustache config/optimism.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen
scripts.prepare:optimism-kovan: mustache config/optimism-kovan.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen
